titles.title: Honoring former Representative Shirley Chisholm, on the occasion of the 85th anniversary of her birth, for her dedication and for providing an example of selfless service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 11/19/2009--Introduced. Honors former Representative Shirley Chisholm, on the occasion of the 85th anniversary of her birth, for her dedication and for providing an example of selfless service.
